isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW SEAL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Vent Window Seal on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

step1.para:
Remove front cab door vent window, refer to
CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 78 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once the front cab door vent window is removed. Pull cab door vent window seal (Item 4) from cab door vent window opening (Item 5) of the front cab door (Item 6), driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door vent window seal.
